Package com.googlecode.kevinarpe.papaya.appendable

Useful implementations of Appendable and other related classes.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ByteAppendable
    This is a byte-based-version of Appendable, which is character-based.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractSimplifiedAppendable
    Reduces the number of methods required for implementation by interface Appendable from three to one.
    AppendablePrintLineWithPrefix
    This is a class is offered as a sample implementation of AbstractSimplifiedAppendable, which implements Appendable.

Package com.googlecode.kevinarpe.papaya.appendable Description

Useful implementations of Appendable and other related classes.

This package is a part of the open-source Papaya library.
